Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Relates to New York state active duty
Summary: Relates to New York state active duty performed under the authority of the governor of New York state.
LawCode: Amd ยง1000, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to military service credit
